messages.subject: New Interview
messages.msgSnippet: This is from the interviewer and podcast owner, Rebecca Bohman. _____________________ Currently your podcast interview with The Luminous Mind is published on
messages.messageBody:
This is from the interviewer and podcast owner, Rebecca Bohman.

_____________________

Currently your podcast interview with The Luminous Mind is published on iTunes and Stitcher! As you will be featured on our website, we invite you to share the following link with your audience.

Libsyn (iTunes and Stitcher Publisher): http://directory.libsyn.com/episode/index/id/5664962

Website: http://www.theluminousmind.net/single-post/2017/08/01/Episode-197---Sandra-Dodd-Everything-Count

YouTube: https://youtu.be/GQjQU9Pvfeo

_____________________

I was afraid to listen to it because the night of the interview, things were awkward and rough at first. But I accidentally clicked it and it sounds okay. :-)

I said “21,” but I was 20 when I graduated from the university. I have a summer birthday. I was 21 when I started teaching, which is the image I had in my mind when I told that part of the story.

I’m getting tired of these stories. But I hope some of you will hear some things you hadn’t heard before. :-)

If I hear any other mistakes I made, I’ll come back and make a note. :-)

And it won’t hurt my feelings if nobody listens or comments about it. Please don’t feel obligated. :-)

Sandra
